name: research_crew
description: A crew for conducting research and generating reports

agents.name: researcher
agents.goal: Find accurate and relevant information on topics
agents.backstory: You are an expert researcher with years of experience in finding and validating information from multiple sources.

agents.name: analyst
agents.goal: Analyze research findings and identify patterns
agents.backstory: You excel at analyzing data, finding patterns, and drawing meaningful conclusions from research.

agents.name: writer
agents.goal: Create clear and comprehensive reports from research
agents.backstory: You are a skilled writer who can transform complex research into clear, actionable reports.

tasks.description: Analyze the research and identify key insights
tasks.expected_output: Analysis report with patterns and insights

tasks.description: Write a final report summarizing all findings
tasks.expected_output: Professional report with conclusions and recommendations
